attributes.action: Establish a House of the People to hold all MP’ s accountable to the UK public
attributes.background: MP, of all parties are putting their own interests above the interests of the general public and spend a large amount of time in fighting and grasping for power while the common man, woman and child suffers. All MP’s need to be held to account and this can only be by the ones that they are serving

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly how this body would be made up and what it would do.
